item.title: Yushun Tang's HomePage
item.description: About me I am currently a Ph.D. student at the Artificial Intelligence Laboratory of the Southern University of Science and Technology (SUSTech). I am also an intern at the 2012 Laboratory of Huawei. Previously, I was an engineer at the TCL Huaxing Optoelectronic Semiconductor Display Technology Co. LTD. I got Bachelorâ€™s degree in 2019 at Harbin Engineering University (HEU). My research interests include machine learning and computer vision, with a focus on transfer learning such as domain adaptation.
